mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (brd_num, brd_title, user_num, brd_writer, brd_content) VALUES (brd_sequence.nextval, #{brd_title}, #{user_num}, #{brd_writer}, #{brd_content})
mapper.select: SELECT brd_num, brd_title, brd_writer, brd_regDate FROM board WHERE brd_del = '0' ORDER BY brd_num DESC
SELECT brd_num, brd_title, brd_writer, brd_content, brd_regdate FROM board WHERE brd_num = #{ brd_num } AND brd_del = '0'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE brd_num = #{ brd_num }
